original_text: Also, somebody may say that you have done something wrong against him. He may take you to stand in front of the judge. You should quickly try to agree with this person. Decide with him how to make things right again. Do this even while you are going with him to the judge. If you do not do that, the judge may agree that you have done a wrong thing. Then he will give you to his officer. His officer will put you in prison.
korean_text: 너를 고발하는 자와 함께 길에 있을 때에 급히 사화하라 그 고발하는 자가 너를 재판관에게 내어 주고 재판관이 옥리에게 내어 주어 옥에 가둘까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: Also, somebody may say that you have done something wrong against him.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 어떤 사람이 당신이 그에게 잘못한 일을 했다고 말할 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: He may take you to stand in front of the judge.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신을 판사 앞에 세우기 위해 데려갈 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: You should quickly try to agree with this person.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 빨리 이 사람과 화해하려고 노력해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Decide with him how to make things right again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 어떻게 다시 올바르게 만들지 결정하세요.

sentences.original_text: Do this even while you are going with him to the judge.
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 판사에게 가는 중에라도 이것을 하세요.

sentences.original_text: If you do not do that, the judge may agree that you have done a wrong thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 그렇게 하지 않으면, 판사는 당신이 잘못한 것에 동의할 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then he will give you to his officer.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 당신을 그의 관리에게 넘길 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: His officer will put you in prison.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 관리는 당신을 감옥에 넣을 것입니다.
